history.action: Read by title, rules suspended, referred to the Committee on Education.
Read by title, amended, ordered engrossed, passed to 3rd reading.
Read third time by title, amended, roll called on final passage, yeas 96, nays 0. Finally passed, title adopted, ordered to the Senate.
Received in the Senate; read by title Rules suspended. Read second time by title and referred to the Committee on Education.
Reported with amendments. Rules suspended. Committee amendments read and adopted. Read by title and referred to the Legislative Bureau.
Reported with Legislative Bureau amendments which were read and adopted. Read by title and passed to third reading and final passage.
The amended bill was read by title, passed by a vote of 35 yeas and 0 nays, and ordered returned to the House. Motion to reconsider tabled.
Received from the Senate with amendments.
Read by title, roll called, yeas 93, nays 0, Senate amendments concurred in.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Signed by the President of the Senate.
Sent to the Governor for executive approval.
Signed by the Governor. Becomes Act No. 48.
